thread.title: J.K. Simmons, Tommy Chong get run of 'Zootopia'
thread.title_full: J.K. Simmons, Tommy Chong get run of 'Zootopia'

title: J.K. Simmons, Tommy Chong get run of 'Zootopia'
text: Disney's 'Zootopia' explores a world where animals live, work and play on two feet and in clothes. VPC Oscar winner J.K. Simmons (Whiplash) provides the voice for Mayor Leodore Lionheart, the noble leader of Zootopia. The mayor coined the city’s mantra: “In Zootopia, anyone can be anything.” (Photo: Disney) 3191 CONNECT 364 TWEET LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE What do filmmakers call the virtual herd of voice actors in Disney's animal-filled Zootopia ? "This is a stampede — no, make that a menagerie — of voice talent," says Rich Moore, who directed Zootopia (in theaters March 4) with Byron Howard and reveals the cast of animated characters to USA TODAY. This includes the proud head of the mammal metropolis Zootopia, Mayor Leodore Lionheart (voice of J.K. Simmons), who coined the animal-harmonious city mantra: “In Zootopia, anyone can be anything.” USA TODAY Sneak peek: Idris Elba goes into 'Zootopia' beast mode "J.K. is so commanding. We needed Lionheart to be a very typical politician. He's very good with the crowd, he has a lot of charisma," says Howard. "And he's so full of himself and blustery." The Zootopia cast is headed by Ginnifer Goodwin, voicing rabbit police officer Judy Hopps, and Jason Bateman, as Hopps' unlikely fox partner, Nick Wilde. Other characters include: Tommy Chong voices Yax the Yak, a most enlightened, laid-back bovine in Zootopia. (Photo: Disney) Tommy Chong as Yax the Yak The Up In Smoke star portrays the trippy yak who gives life advice from the front desk of the local Zen retreat. "Yax is into a naturalist lifestyle, holistic living and getting back to nature," says Howard. "He's an emotional life coach," adds Moore. "And I would want Tommy Chong as my life coach!" Tommy Lister voices Finnick, a fennec fox with a big chip on his adorable shoulder. (Photo: Disney) Tommy Lister as Finnick Lister, who towers at 6-foot-5, voices Finnick, a fennec fox and one of the tiniest characters in Zootopia. "We like that Finnick is played by one of the world's most enormous men," says Howard. "So he has this huge, booming voice. It surprises people." Jenny Slate voices Assistant Mayor Bellwether, a sweet sheep with a little voice and a lot of wool. (Photo: Disney) Jenny Slate as Bellwether The Obvious Child star voices the sheep who is assistant mayor. "She’s the harried, put-upon assistant to Mayor Lionheart. She’s a very sweet sheep," says Moore. "Jenny was perfect. She has a crazy, kinetic energy in her characters, all in her voice." Alan Tudyk (Frozen) returns to Disney’s recording studio as the voice of Duke Weaselton, a small-time weasel crook with a big-time mouth. (Photo: Disney) Alan Tudyk as Duke Weaselton Weaselton is a small-time crook not to be trusted. He's appropriately named, given that Tudyk voiced the Duke of Weselton in Frozen . "Alan thought the name was very funny and loved the meta-nature of the joke," says Howard. Bonnie Hunt provides the voice of Bonnie Hopps, Judy's mother. Don Lake voices Judy’s father, Stu, a carrot farmer from Bunnyburrow. (Photo: Disney) Bonnie Hunt and Don Lake as Bonnie and Stu Hopps The longtime comedy team voice Judy Hopps' rabbit parents. "We recorded them together to get the real chemistry. They are so funny together," says Moore. "It sells this idea of a couple married for so long who have 275 rabbit children." Raymond Persi voices Flash, the fastest sloth working at Zootopia's DMV — the Department of Mammal Vehicles. (Photo: Disney) Raymond Persi as Flash Persi, a Disney story artist, performed early voice tests for the fastest sloth working at Zootopia's DMV (Department of Mammal Vehicles). "But sometimes the test dialogue is so good, you fall in love with it," says Moore. "Why change perfection?" Idris Elba provides the voice of Chief Bogo, head of the Zootopia Police Department, in Disney's Zootopia, in theaters March 4. In this exclusive look at the animated film's extended cast, Elba says he took the part by the horns. "I've definitely got some shoulder-envy," he says. Disney Fullscreen Oscar winner Octavia Spencer (The Help) voices Mrs. Otterton. Disney Fullscreen Oscar winner J.K. Simmons (Whiplash) provides the voice for Mayor Leodore Lionheart, the noble leader of Zootopia. The mayor coined the city’s mantra: “In Zootopia, anyone can be anything.” Disney Fullscreen Tommy Chong voices Yax the Yak, a most enlightened, laid-back bovine in Zootopia. Disney Fullscreen Nate Torrence lends his voice to the Zootopia Police Department’s charming cheetah, Benjamin Clawhauser. He loves his doughnuts and his pop stars. Disney Fullscreen Jenny Slate voices Assistant Mayor Bellwether, a sweet sheep with a little voice and a lot of wool. Disney Fullscreen Alan Tudyk (Frozen) returns to Disney’s recording studio as the voice of Duke Weaselton, a small-time weasel crook with a big-time mouth. Disney Fullscreen Raymond Persi voices Flash, the fastest sloth working at Zootopia's DMV — the Department of Mammal Vehicles. Disney Fullscreen Judy Hopps (Ginnifer Goodwin) is a ground-breaking rabbit trying to make it as a cop in the Zootopia Police Department. Disney Fullscreen Bonnie Hunt provides the voice of Bonnie Hopps, Judy's mother. Don Lake voices Judy’s father, Stu, a carrot farmer from Bunnyburrow. Disney Fullscreen Foxy Nick Wilde (voiced by Jason Bateman) is working with a rabbit partner to solve a Zootopia crime. Disney Fullscreen Like this topic?
